name: Saskatchewan Music Large Ensembles
description: This dataset was produced to show information about sound recordings from large ensembles (bands, orchestras, and choirs) from Saskatchewan. These recordings are found in the Saskatchewan Music Collection, held at the University Library, University of Saskatchewan. The data are modified MARC catalogue records and were used to create a geospatial visualization in ArcGIS (http://arcg.is/2iA5P4q).

distribution.name: SMC_enssub_final.csv
distribution.description: This csv. file is based on catalogue records in MARC format, which were extracted from the Saskatchewan Music Collection at the University of Saskatchewan. The dataset includes music albums by large ensembles (bands, choirs, orchestras) in Saskatchewan.
